overview.heading: Burbank Virtual Office
overview.body: Relish the sophistication of a prominent business address in Burbank, unencumbered by the financial obligations that accompany a brick-and-mortar office lease. Opus VO offers you the exclusive chance to locate your business in one of our prime Burbank spots, all for a fraction of a traditional office lease. Utilize our cutting-edge conference rooms for business meetings and meaningful client interactions, while enhancing your brand’s allure with a prominent Burbank address.  Electing a virtual office in Burbank through Opus VO gives you a live receptionist and our commitment to individualized, elite customer service. Our team assures that each interaction with your clientele is in harmony with your business goals. Let us handle the administrative duties like complete mail handling and call-forwarding, giving you the liberty to focus on your business growth.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Burbank, California even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Burbank. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within California.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Burbank virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Choose a Burbank Virtual Office?
sections.body: Burbank is far more than a media capital; it’s a dynamic nerve center for commerce, particularly flourishing in industries like entertainment, technology, and aviation. Perfectly positioned near vital commercial hubs, our Burbank offices offer you effortless access to key business relationships and stimulating networking experiences.  By opting for an Opus Virtual Office in Burbank, you’re not merely reducing your operational expenses; you’re seizing an invaluable competitive upper hand. Grow your business to unparalleled success by harnessing our virtual office services today.  Choose from one of our two Opus VO Burbank locations @ 1912 W. Burbank Blvd, Burbank, CA 91506 or 3727 W. Magnolia Blvd. Burbank, CA 91505
